properties.name: opcal.cloud.web.servlet.request-id
properties.description: Whether to enable setting servlet request id to header 'X-Request-Id'.

properties.name: opcal.cloud.log.servlet.request-id
properties.description: Whether to enable setting servlet request id as thread id for logging.

properties.name: opcal.cloud.log.servlet.request
properties.description: Whether to enable logging servlet request and response.

properties.name: opcal.cloud.web.reactive.request-id
properties.description: Whether to enable setting reactive request id to header 'X-Request-Id'.

properties.name: opcal.cloud.log.reactive.request-id
properties.description: Whether to enable setting reactive request id as thread id for logging.

properties.name: opcal.cloud.log.reactive.request
properties.description: Whether to enable logging reactive request and response.

properties.name: opcal.cloud.feign.request-id
properties.description: Whether to enable setting http header 'X-Request-Id' for feign client.

properties.name: opcal.cloud.feignreactive.request-id
properties.description: Whether to enable setting http header 'X-Request-Id' for feignreactive client.
